relevant_findings.general: Alert, oriented, no acute distress, lying comfortable in bed.
relevant_findings.HEENT: NCAT, MMM, EOMI, sclera anicteric, OP clear.
relevant_findings.PULM: Good aeration, CTAB, no wheezes, rales, ronchi.
relevant_findings.ABD: Soft, ND, normoactive bowel sounds, no r/g, TTP in RLQ.
relevant_findings.EXT: WWP, 2+ pulses palpable bilaterally, no c/c/e.
relevant_findings.NEURO: CNs 2-12 intact, motor function grossly normal.

relevant_findings.abdominal: Benign physical exam, not tender to palpation, no visible mucosal damage or blood in oropharynx.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Mildly tachycardic but normal heart sounds otherwise.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient continued to complain of RLQ pain that radiates to RUQ.
